org.siframework.abbi.api
Interface Context

All Known Implementing Classes:
Search
public interface Context

The Context interface is passed to the back-end to provide it with access to a few critical services, such as logging, and access to resources by name.

Author:
Keith W. Boone

Method Summary

Method Detail

log

void log(java.lang.String message)
This method generates a message in the log

Parameters:
message - The message to print.

log

void log(java.lang.String message,
         java.lang.Throwable t)
This method generates a message and a stack trace in the log

Parameters:
message - The message to generate (may be null)
t - A throwable whose stack trace will be written to the log

getResource

java.io.InputStream getResource(java.lang.String name)
This method provides access to a file resource as a stream.

Parameters:
name - The name of the resource to access.
Returns:
An InputStream that can be used to access the resource.
